
```{r results='asis'}

```





```{r results='asis'}
skim(iris) %>% kable()
```




```{r}
skim_to_wide(iris) %>% datatable()
```


```{r}
library(arsenal)
```



```{r}
iris %>% 
  mutate(couleur = sample(c("bleu","violet"),size = 150,replace=TRUE)) %>% 
  select(Species,couleur) %>% 
  table() %>% 
  arsenal::freqlist() %>% 
  summary()
```
